description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
freeze the foe.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
freeze the foe.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Blasts the foe with an icy
beam that may freeze it.
description.emerald:
Blasts the foe with an icy
beam that may freeze it.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is struck
with an icy beam.
It may freeze the
foe solid.
description.diamond-pearl:
The foe is struck
with an icy-cold
beam of energy.
It may also freeze
the target solid.

with an icy-cold

the target solid.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
